subsection_content:
Depending on the cause of nocturia, your doctor will provide appropriate treatment, specifically:
Due to the effects of medication: Patients should use medication earlier in the day.; Due to sleep apnea: Patients are recommended to see a sleep specialist or cardiologist.; Due to disease: Nocturia can be a sign of serious disease such as diabetes, urinary tract infection... Cases of nocturia due to disease will often improve when the disease is well controlled.
